name: 24H Stories: The Rule 7
description:
Introduction


Play as a victim tormented by the program, spending a week in fear. You must do your utmost to follow those rules, even if they lead you to commit crimes or even murder. Through continuous attempts, you may discover that there might be a way to destroy this program?

Horror Events


  • The program will generate some horror events around you.
  • These horror events will hinder your obey the rules (The program just want to torment you).
  • You can solve the troubles within these horror events in various ways.

Crime


Inducing you to commit a crime is definitely a rule, but how should you obey it?
Any crime requires detailed planning, such as loosening the screws on the window, then tricking a female colleague into standing by the window, and finally pushing her out...



Wait, you said you lack exercise and don't have the strength to push her down? No problem, there are other ways to kill her, plenty of fun options!

Nightmare


Nightmares are the means the program uses to punish you. But rest assured, nightmares won't kill you.
After all, you, as this little rabbit, still need to survive until the 7th day.
Nightmares will have different themes, and one of them is fending off zombies using guns. (A tribute to a every-year-publish FPS game's zombie mode.)



Content


  • First Person: Experience a week from a first-person perspective.
  • Nonlinear: The game content will change based on your actions. As you repeatedly challenge this terrifying week, you will always discover new content!
  • Puzzle-solving: Completing the rules themselves is a puzzle, as some rules may become impossible to fulfill due to certain circumstances, and you need to solve any troubles hindering you.
  • Non-unique answers: The way to solve a puzzle is not fixed. Observant and analytical individuals may find unexpected rewards.
  • Horror: Want to experience more horror? It's simple, break the rules.
  • Multiple Endings: Your actions will influence your endings. You must find that glimmer of hope in despair.
  • Save Function: The game will save your progress at the end of each day. If you feel you've made a mistake in any step, you can load a saved game at any time.
